InboxIQ: Your Privacy-First Gmail Assistant

🔒 Privacy & Security First:
● You provide your own OpenAI API key
● No servers store your conversations or email data
● All email processing apart from OpenAi happens locally on your device

⚠️ Important Note:
This extension requires your own OpenAI API key. This approach ensures that you have full control over your data and API usage. We never see or store your API key or any of your email content. Your data goes straight to OpenAi and straight back; We never middleman.

───────────Key Features───────────
📧 Email Thread Summaries:
Get concise summaries of lengthy email threads, helping you quickly grasp the main points.

❓ Follow-up Questions:
Ask questions about your emails and get AI-powered responses to clarify information or generate ideas.

⚙️ Customizable Settings:
Tailor the extension to your needs with adjustable settings for conversation lifetime and more.

🔐 Built for Privacy:
Your data never leaves your device. We don't see or store any of your email content or conversations.

💡 AI-Powered Assistance:
Leverage the power of AI to enhance your email productivity without compromising your data.

───────────Release Notes ───────────
    ● Initial Launch!
─────────── Coming Soon ───────────
   ● Outlook support
   ●Style updates
